formulas.raw: Taxable Income: $$\mathrm{VT\_TI}=\max\{0,\ \mathrm{AGI}-D-E\}$$ where AGI is Adjusted Gross Income, D is deduction (standard or itemized), and E is total personal exemptions. Piecewise Marginal Tax: $$T=\sum_{i=1}^{n} r_i \cdot \max\Big(0,\ \min\big(\mathrm{VT\_TI},\ u_i\big)-u_{i-1}\Big)$$ with brackets defined by upper bounds u_i (u_0 = 0) and rates r_i. For the top bracket, use u_n=\infty. Credits and Final Tax: $$T_{\text{net}}=\max\{0,\ T - C\}$$ Effective Rate: $$\mathrm{ER}=\begin{cases}\dfrac{T_{\text{net}}}{\mathrm{AGI}},& \mathrm{AGI}>0\\[6pt]0,& \mathrm{otherwise}\end{cases}$$
